name: estafette-ci-web
description: The web frontend for Estafette CI
author: Jorrit Salverda

scripts.demo: ADD_TRAILING_SLASH_TO_API_REQUEST=true npm run build && rm -rf docs/api && rm -rf docs/static && cp favicon.ico docs/ && cp -r ./dist/* docs/ && cp -r ./mocks/api docs/ && mkdir -p docs/{pipelines,catalog,insights,create,configuration,admin,user,login} docs/pipelines/{all,builds,releases,bots} docs/insights/{counters,rankings,trends} docs/create/{generate,validate} docs/configuration/{credentials,trusted-images} docs/admin/{users,groups,organizations,clients,encrypt} docs/user/{details,preferences} docs/catalog/{services,entities} && find docs/{pipelines,catalog,insights,create,configuration,admin,user,login}/ docs/pipelines/{all,builds,releases,bots}/ docs/insights/{counters,rankings,trends}/ docs/create/{generate,validate}/ docs/configuration/{credentials,trusted-images}/ docs/admin/{users,groups,organizations,clients,encrypt}/ docs/user/{details,preferences}/ docs/catalog/{services,entities}/ -maxdepth 0 -exec cp docs/index.html {} \;
